CustomField.description: Displays the Default Assigned To Fields.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Contact_Designer_Detailer_Approver1__c),"",Contact_Designer_Detailer_Approver1__r.FirstName + " " + Contact_Designer_Detailer_Approver1__r.LastName) + IF(ISBLANK(Detailer_Approver2__c),"","," + Detailer_Approver2__r.FirstName + " " + Detailer_Approver2__r.LastName) + IF(ISBLANK(Detailer_Approver3__c),"","," + Detailer_Approver3__r.FirstName + " " + Detailer_Approver3__r.LastName) + IF(ISBLANK(Detailer_Approver4__c),"","," + Detailer_Approver4__r.FirstName + " " + Detailer_Approver4__r.LastName) + IF(ISBLANK(Detailer_Approver5__c),"","," + Detailer_Approver5__r.FirstName + " " + Detailer_Approver5__r.LastName)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays a comma separated list of the Detailers / Designers on the task.
CustomField.label: Assigned To
